times_after_stroke.Description: Time between stroke and first scanning

pre_score.Description: Patient's score evaluated using Vasserman scale, before reabilitation intervention occures.

post_score.Description: Patient's score evaluated using Vasserman scale, after reabilitation intervention occures.

Levels.m-am: Motor and acoustic-mnestic combination of aphasies

size.Description: Conventional size of the stroke lession

Broca.Description: Shows whether Broca area injured by the stroke

Levels.Y: Area was sugnificantly injured by the stroke
Levels.P: Area was partially injured by the stroke
Levels.N: Area wasn't injured by the stroke

Wernike.Description: Shows whether Wernike area injured by the stroke

Levels.Y: Area was sugnificantly injured by the stroke
Levels.P: Area was partially injured by the stroke
Levels.N: Area wasn't injured by the stroke

Basal.Description: Shows whether Basal ganlia injured by the stroke

Levels.Y: Area was sugnificantly injured by the stroke
Levels.P: Area was partially injured by the stroke
Levels.N: Area wasn't injured by the stroke

Talamus.Description: Shows whether Talamus injured by the stroke

Levels.Y: Area was sugnificantly injured by the stroke
Levels.P: Area was partially injured by the stroke
Levels.N: Area wasn't injured by the stroke
